GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a given article_id and appropriate errors that might occur

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to the article specified by `article_id`. Requires `username` and `body` in the request body.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: This endpoint allows users to update the vote count of an article by its article_id. The request body should contain an object specifying the inc_votes value, which determines how much the votes property should be incremented or decremented. The response returns the updated article with the new vote count.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: This endpoint allows users to delete a comment through the comment_id

GET /api/users.description: This endpoint allows users to fetch all users

GET /api/articles/sort_by=query&order=as.description: This endpoint allows user to query articles using sort_by and order
GET /api/articles/sort_by=query&order=as.response: api responds with approapriate article for the sort_by and order queries

GET /api/articles/topic=query.description: This endpoint allows user to query articles using topic
GET /api/articles/topic=query.response: api responds with approapriate articles for topic query
